header.alt: Tessel is hardware for web developers.
Build and scale thousands of embedded devices with the intuitive Tessel platform.
Tessel supports plug-and-play modules as well as GPIO sensors.

modules.name: Accelerometer
modules.description: Detect orientation and movement of your Tessel by measuring gravity / acceleration.

modules.name: Ambient
modules.description: Detect ambient light and sound levels. Trigger on loud noises and changes in light level.

modules.name: Relay
modules.description: Control high-current devices, such as power cords and appliances.

modules.name: Climate
modules.description: Detect humidity and temperature from your environment.

modules.name: Infrared
modules.description: Send and detect IR signals. Use a Tessel as a remote for your TV, or radio.

modules.name: Servo
modules.description: Make it move! Control up to 16 hobby/RC servo motors.

modules.name: RFID
modules.description: Read 13.56MHz RFID cards, including CharlieCards, ClipperCards, and other transit cards, or the card provided.

modules.name: BLE
modules.description: Allows your tesselation to work as a Bluetooth LE central or peripheral device. Connect to your phone, FitBit, or other device.

modules.name: Cellular
modules.description: Connect your Tessel anywhere with support for mobile internet on a GSM-based network.
modules.alt: Tessel GPRS (General Packet Radio Service/SIM Card) Module

modules.name: MicroSD
modules.description: Read and write microSD cards. Store pictures or other data from your Tessel.

modules.name: Camera
modules.description: Add the sense of sight to Tessel! Take pictures of your projects, from your projects.

modules.name: DIY
modules.description: Protoboard to build your own module!
modules.alt: Tessel DIY Module, for easy module prototyping

community_modules.name: Distance
community_modules.description: Sense distance in centimeters with the ultrasound proximity sensor.

community_modules.name: Color Sensor
community_modules.description: This RGB Color Sensor is like an eyedropper tool for the real world.

community_modules.name: Keypad
community_modules.description: Read inputs from a small keypad.

community_modules.name: Lights/LEDs
community_modules.description: Control the color of individually addressable LED lights.

community_modules.name: Motion
community_modules.description: Detect motion â€“ know when something's happening.

community_modules.name: Motors
community_modules.description: Drive one or two small motors with Tessel.

community_modules.name: Pulse
community_modules.description: Sense your pulse and fire events with each heartbeat.

community_modules.name: Screen
community_modules.description: A basic graphic LCD screen, this display lets you add UI to your Tessel project.

community_modules.name: Button/Switch
community_modules.description: Add a switch or button to your module port.

testimonials.name: Abe Gong
testimonials.quote: The Tessel platform saved us $16k in development costs and cut our timeline in half.
testimonials.title: CEO, Metta Smartwear
testimonials.alt: Abe Gong, Entrepreneur at Metta Smartwear, uses Tessel

testimonials.name: Craig Cmehil
testimonials.quote: The Tessel platform has proven to be a perfect tool to introduce our developer community to the Internet of Things and its ease at connecting to SAP HANA is just ideal.
testimonials.title: Director, Global Developer Relations at SAP AG
testimonials.alt: Craig Cmeil, Director Global Developer Relations at SAP AG, uses Tessel

testimonials.name: Daniel Imrie-Situnayake
testimonials.quote: Tessel's platform permits rapid iteration of the sensing and control systems that power our novel agricultural systems, using the same skills we use to code our back-end infrastructure.
testimonials.title: Founder, Tiny Farms
testimonials.alt: Daniel Imrie-Situnayake, Founder of Tiny Farms, uses Tessel
